content: DSSAL@SKKUSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationData Science andÂ Social Analytics Lab (DSSAL)Prof. Jang-Hyun Kim's Data Science and Social Analytics Lab(DSSAL) is an active group of researchers in the Department of Interaction Science, the Department of Applied Artificial Intelligence, the Department of Applied Data Science, and the Department of Immersive Media Engineering, Sungkyunkwan University, Seoul, Korea.We explore people, technology, and their networks using artificial intelligence and big data.Human-AI InteractionNatural Language ProcessingMultimodal Large Language ModelReport abusePage detailsPage updated Report abuse
